It's a great game, there is nothing to argue there.
CS:GO Is one of the few ''real'' E-sports as of today and there is plenty of reason as to why.

It's fair to point out however that the greatest shortcomming of this game is the community. The game runs on an old engine that is well exploited meaning that you will most likely run into a cheater more often than you'd like.

If you want a challenge in a great E-sport, then you should play CS:GO. Just know that you'll hear a lot of russian and some games will be rather anoying due to the amount of cheaters atm.
(Also: Some of the best players i've played with are from Russia, most of the community atm is from there thus the mention of it above).
The Foundation for all competitive shooters, that's all. 10/10
